short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to avoid distractions and stay in flow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Atomic Flow is a Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused and minimize distractions while you work. It lets you block popular social media sites like YouTube, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram, and LinkedIn with a simple click of a button, so you can work more productively and efficiently.
